lines.text: There are no great men, only great challenges that ordinary men are forced by circumstances to meet.
lines.character: Fleet Admiral William F. 'Bull' Halsey Jr.

lines.text: Half a carrier is better than none.
lines.character: Fleet Admiral William F. 'Bull' Halsey Jr.

lines.text: Admiral, where you gonna get all that stuff you promised those commanders?

lines.character: Fleet Admiral William F. 'Bull' Halsey Jr.
